text: Mud Lake is an oxbow lake located in northwestern DeSoto County, Mississippi and in southwestern Shelby County, Tennessee. It was created by changes in the flow of the Mississippi River and borders Horn Lake (Tennessee) to the east. ==References== Category:Bodies of water of DeSoto County, Mississippi Category:Lakes of Mississippi Category:Lakes of Tennessee Category:Bodies of water of Shelby County, Tennessee Category:Oxbow lakes of the United States
title: Mud Lake (Mississippi–Tennessee)
